projects.name: Black Talons (Canceled)

projects.name: Pits:  Tabletop Combat for Mobile (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Pits is a table top tactical combat game that re-imagines the role of luck in the genre.  For table top and mobile devices.

projects.blurb: ZNAF is a 4 player co-op game which breaks the cross platform barrier - Major Consoles/PC/Mac/Linux/Android/iPhone/Tablets OMG

projects.name: Bring Addison (and friends) to life! (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Addison is an interactive game that will work side by side with parents and teachers to help bring fun and entertainment into learning.

projects.name: Antithesis, Reality... A conceptual exploration in noir
projects.blurb: "Antithesis, Reality..." is a story-driven concept game with gameplay changing from level to level and a mystery story moving it.

projects.name: The Last Echo (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Help create an emotional arcade shooter. The story of a small robot hoping to find answers to the hostility of the world he lives in.

projects.blurb: Orthus Exile is an RPG for the PC heavily inspired by Dark Souls and Final Fantasy.

projects.blurb: A cross-platform MOBA-like strategy game inspired by Warcraft III, DotA and League of Legends.

projects.name: Elodia for Nintendo Wii U and PC. (Canceled)
projects.blurb: The greatest rpg epic tale ever woven into the form of a game. PC, Mac, Linux, Wii U.

projects.blurb: Are you ready for an early 90's style Golden Axe inspired comedy brawler with a serious pair of unicorns balls!

projects.name: Wing Rage (Canceled)
projects.blurb: A multiplayer reboot of the classic arcade shooter genre, allowing the player and hundreds of AI to engage in intense tactical battles.

projects.name: Bubble Pop Free (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Bubble Pop is a completely free to play casual puzzle, and physics game. Bubble Pop features many different and challenging levels

projects.name: Gameroni: Your Window on Game Site Development (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Go behind the scenes to learn just what all goes into a video game site's development during one of the year's busiest months.

projects.name: New 8-bit pixel blasting indie game : Pixel Star - 01
projects.blurb: Avoid obstacles, collect power-ups, and obliterate enemies into a fine pixelated mist in this new 8-bit space shooter. #freethegames

projects.name: Dark Descent (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Dark Descent is an iOS game that challenges you to battle your dark side.  Who wins the eternal battle?  Only you are in control.

projects.name: Anime Poker (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Anime Poker is a free to play RPG style implemented online poker game playable on facebook, iOS, and our website.

projects.name: Filmplay - Movies That Put You In Control (Canceled)
projects.blurb: An app that lets you play the character of a movie, find items, and make choices for the main character to decide how the movie ends.

projects.name: Nightmare on Chicken Street (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Why did the chicken cross the road? You'll find out why it's no laughing matter in this addicting arcade inspired video game.

projects.name: Mix Blox Kickstarter (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Mix Blox is a game that mixes classic block puzzler gaming with elements of other game types such as shoot'em ups and sidescrollers.
